name: Minicode Talker
text:
1 Cyberse Monster, except "Minicode Talker"
If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Code" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card was Link Summoned using a "Code" monster, cards and effects cannot be activated in response to this effect. You can only use the effect of "Minicode Talker" once per turn.
